item.title: Data Science in Football and Success from Liverpool F.C
item.description: Can Data Science can be applied in Football Analysis? Link to heading Football is increasingly being analyzed and predicted through meaningful statistics. If you’re a true sports fan, you’ll find that these numbers are far from unfamiliar! Undoubtedly, data is a big concern in football. It’s not an easy task to record every event that occurs in a match. But in reality, this is changing as every action on the field is being recorded and represented in the most visual way.
